Lionel:
In order to get the full power of Parme you need to contract once made by her with Fafurion. However, after her death the document is torn into pieces. You need to go to Fafurion Temple, to defeat Temple Guard Captain, Temple Guard Captain, Elite Guardian Warrior, Elite Guardian Archer, Temple Patrol Guard, Temple Knight Recruit, Temple Guard, Temple Guardian Warrior, Temple Wizard, Temple Guardian Wizard, Temple Priest, Temple Guardian Priest, Starving Water Dragon and get 30 Broken Contract Fragments carried by the beasts...
